descriptionHtml:
~STARTING TORCH~ 

A simply yet very effective and necessary mod for people like myself who like to immerse themselves with darker nights and dungeon type mods. I always hated starting the game with no torch, and having to stumble my way through the darkness in the beginning. 

With this mod it adds a torch next to the beginning corpse, and also one located on body when you loot it. These two torches should last you long enough to get you through Helgenâ€™s Keep and out to the outside world to find more torches. 

I also made a few more realistic modifications to the corpse while I was there, such as adding a bit of blood and I moved the equipable axe to the outside of the body. As I said before, I love immersion! 

~PLEASE SUBSCRIBE/RATE/FAVORITE~ 

Please let me know of any issues, there should be none however being that this is such a basic modification. 
================================== 

Feel free to subscribe to my collection, you can count on a game changing experience with close to a 100 mods working in unison for a very hardcore, realistic, more beautiful, exciting experience. 

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=22321

Video: http://youtu.be/eWON5gVvVZY
author: xXxDOYLExXx
